 50#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 51template<>
 52struct List<op::prod_vv_outer>
 53{
 54  typedef Make_type_list<be::cml,
 55			 be::blas,
 56			 be::mercury_sal,
 57			 be::cvsip,
 58			 be::generic>::type type;
 59};
 60#endif
 61
 62/// Generic evaluator for outer product
 63template <typename T1,
 64	  typename Block0,
 65	  typename Block1,
 66	  typename Block2>
 67struct Evaluator<op::prod_vv_outer, be::generic,
 68                 void(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)>
 69{
 70  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 71  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&) 
 72    { return true; }
 73
 74  static void exec(Block0& r, T1 alpha, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
 75  {
 76    assert(a.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 0));
 77    assert(b.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 1));
 78
 79    // r(i, j) = alpha * a(i) * b(j)
 80    for ( index_type i = a.size(); i-- > 0; )
 81      for ( index_type j = b.size(); j-- > 0; )
 82        r.put( i, j, alpha * a.get(i) * b.get(j) );
 83  }
 84};
 85
 86/// Generic evaluator for outer product (with conjugate)
 87template <typename T1,
 88	  typename Block0,
 89	  typename Block1,
 90	  typename Block2>
 91struct Evaluator<op::prod_vv_outer, be::generic,
 92                 void(Block0&, std::complex<T1>, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)>
 93{
 94  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 95  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, std::complex<T1>, Block1 const&, Block2 const&) 
 96    { return true; }
 97
 98  static void exec(Block0& r, std::complex<T1> alpha, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
 99  {
100    assert(a.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 0));
101    assert(b.size(1, 0) == r.size(2, 1));
102
103    // r(i, j) = alpha * a(i) * b(j)
104    for ( index_type i = a.size(); i-- > 0; )
105      for ( index_type j = b.size(); j-- > 0; )
106        r.put( i, j, alpha * a.get(i) * conj(b.get(j)) );
107  }
108};
109

112#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
113template<>
114struct List<op::prod_vv_dot>
115{
116  typedef Make_type_list<be::cml,
117			 be::cuda,
118			 be::blas,
119			 be::mercury_sal, 
120			 be::cvsip,
121			 be::generic>::type type;
122};
123#endif
124
125/// Generic evaluator for vector-vector dot-product.
126template <typename T,
127	  typename Block0,
128	  typename Block1>
129struct Evaluator<op::prod_vv_dot, be::generic,
130                 T(Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>
131{
132  static bool const ct_valid = true;
133  static bool rt_valid(Block0 const&, Block1 const&) { return true; }
134
135  static T exec(Block0 const& a, Block1 const& b)
136  {
137    assert(a.size(1, 0) == b.size(1, 0));
138
139    T r = T();
140    for ( index_type i = 0; i < a.size(); ++i )
141      r += a.get(i) * b.get(i);
142    return r;
143  }
144};
145
146
147#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
148template<>
149struct List<op::prod_gemp>
150{
151  typedef Make_type_list<be::cml,
152			 be::blas,
153			 be::mercury_sal, 
154			 be::cvsip,
155			 be::generic>::type type;
156};
157#endif
158
159/// Generic evaluator for general product
160template <typename T1,
161	  typename T2,
162	  typename Block0,
163	  typename Block1,
164	  typename Block2>
165struct Evaluator<op::prod_gemp, be::generic,
166                 void(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T2)>
167{
168  static bool const ct_valid = true;
169  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, T1, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T2) 
170    { return true; }
171
172  static void exec(Block0& c, T1 alpha, Block1 const& a, 
173    Block2 const& b, T2 beta)
174  {
175    assert( a.size(2, 0) == c.size(2, 0) );
176    assert( b.size(2, 1) == c.size(2, 1) );
177    assert( a.size(2, 1) == b.size(2, 0) );  
178    
179    // c(i,j) = alpha * a(i) * b(j) + beta * c(i,j)
180    for ( index_type i = a.size(2, 0); i-- > 0; )
181    {
182      for ( index_type j = b.size(2, 1); j-- > 0; )
183      {
184        T1 dot = T1();
185        for ( index_type k = 0; k < a.size(2, 1); ++k )
186          dot += a.get(i, k) * b.get(k, j);
187
188        c.put(i, j, alpha * dot + beta * c.get(i, j));
189      }
190    }
191  }
192};
193
194} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
195} // namespace vsip_csl

202/// Outer product dispatch
203template <typename T0,
204	  typename T1,
205	  typename T2,
206	  typename Block0,
207	  typename Block1,
208	  typename Block2>
209void
210outer(
211  T0 alpha, 
212  const_Vector<T0, Block0> a,
213  const_Vector<T1, Block1> b,
214  Matrix<T2, Block2>       r)
215{
216  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
217  assert(r.size(0) == a.size());
218  assert(r.size(1) == b.size());
219#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
220  Evaluator<op::prod_vv_outer, be::cvsip, 
221    void(Block2&, T0, Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>::exec
222    (r.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block());
223#else
224  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::prod_vv_outer, void,
225    Block2&, T0, Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
226    (r.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block());
227#endif
228}
229
230
231// Dot product dispatch.  This is intentionally not named 'dot' to avoid
232// conflicting with vsip::dot, which shares the same signature, forcing
233// the user to resolve the call themselves.
234template <typename T0, typename T1, typename Block0, typename Block1>
235typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type
236impl_dot(
237  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
238  const_Vector<T1, Block1> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
239{
240  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
241
242  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
243  return_type r(0);
244
245#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
246  r = Evaluator<op::prod_vv_dot, be::cvsip,
247    return_type(Block0 const&, Block1 const&) >::exec
248    (v.block(), w.block());
249#else
250  r = vsip_csl::dispatch<op::prod_vv_dot, return_type,
251    Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
252    (v.block(), w.block());
253#endif
254  return r;
255};
256
257
258/// Generic vector-vector kron
259template <typename T0,
260          typename T1,
261          typename T2,
262          typename Block1,
263          typename Block2>
264const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
265impl_kron( T0 alpha, Vector<T1, Block1> v, Vector<T2, Block2> w)
266    VSIP_NOTHROW
267{
268  typedef Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, 
269    typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type> return_type;
270  return_type r(w.size(), v.size());
271
272  for (index_type i = w.size(); i-- > 0;)
273    for (index_type j = v.size(); j-- > 0;)
274      r.put(i, j, alpha * w.get(i) * v.get(j));
275
276  return r;
277}
278
279/// Generic matrix-matrix kron
280template <typename T0,
281          typename T1,
282          typename T2,
283          typename Block1,
284          typename Block2>
285const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
286impl_kron( T0 alpha, Matrix<T1, Block1> v, Matrix<T2, Block2> w)
287    VSIP_NOTHROW
288{
289  typedef Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, 
290    typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type> return_type;
291  const length_type row_size = v.size(0) * w.size(0);
292  const length_type col_size = v.size(1) * w.size(1);
293
294  return_type r( row_size, col_size );
295  for ( index_type i = v.size(0); i-- > 0; )
296    for ( index_type j = w.size(0); j-- > 0; )
297      for ( index_type k = v.size(1); k-- > 0; )
298        for ( index_type l = w.size(1); l-- > 0; ) 
299        {
300          T0 val = alpha * v.get(i,k) * w.get(j,l);
301          r.put( j + (i * w.size(0)), l + (k * w.size(1)), val );
302        }
303
304  return r;
305}
306
307
308/// General matrix product dispatch
309template <typename T0,
310	  typename T1,
311	  typename T2,
312	  typename T4,
313	  typename Block1,
314	  typename Block2,
315	  typename Block4>
316void
317gemp(T0 alpha, const_Matrix<T1, Block1> a,
318     const_Matrix<T2, Block2> b, T0 beta, Matrix<T4, Block4> c) 
319{
320  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
321
322  assert(c.size(0) == a.size(0));
323  assert(c.size(1) == b.size(1));
324
325#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
326  Evaluator<op::prod_gemp, be::cvsip,
327    void(Block4&, T0, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T0)>::exec
328    (c.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block(), beta);
329#else
330  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::prod_gemp, void,
331    Block4&, T0, Block1 const&, Block2 const&, T0> 
332    (c.block(), alpha, a.block(), b.block(), beta);
333#endif
334}
335
336/// General matrix sum
337template <typename T0, typename T1, typename T3, typename T4,
338  typename Block1, typename Block4>
339void 
340gems( T0 alpha, const_Matrix<T1, Block1> A, T3 beta, Matrix<T4, Block4> C) 
341{
342  assert( A.size(0) == C.size(0) );
343  assert( A.size(1) == C.size(1) );
344  C = alpha * A + beta * C;
345}
346
347
348
349/// Class to perform transpose or hermetian (conjugate-transpose),
350/// depending on value type.
351
352/// Primary case - perform transpose.
353template <typename T,
354	  typename Block>
355struct Trans_or_herm
356{
357  typedef typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type result_type;
358
359  static result_type
360  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
361  {
362    return m.transpose();
363  }
364};
365
366/// Complex specialization - perform hermetian.
367template <typename T,
368	  typename Block>
369struct Trans_or_herm<complex<T>, Block>
370{
371  typedef typename const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block>::transpose_type 
372      transpose_type;
373  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<expr::op::Conj, transpose_type> 
374      functor_type;
375  typedef typename functor_type::result_type result_type;
376
377  static result_type
378  exec(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
379  {
380    return functor_type::apply(m.transpose());
381  } 
382};
383
384/// Perform transpose or hermetian, depending on value type.
385template <typename T,
386	  typename Block>
387inline
388typename Trans_or_herm<T, Block>::result_type
389trans_or_herm(const_Matrix<T, Block> m)
390{
391  return Trans_or_herm<T, Block>::exec(m);
392};
393
394
395
396/// Generalized class used to invoke the correct matrix operator
397template <mat_op_type OpT,
398          typename    T,
399          typename    Block>
400struct Apply_mat_op;
401
402/// 'No transpose' matrix operator
403template <typename T,
404          typename Block>
405struct Apply_mat_op<mat_ntrans, T, Block>
406{
407  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> result_type;
408
409  static result_type
410  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
411    {
412      return m;
413    }
414};
415
416/// 'Transpose' matrix operator
417template <typename T,
418          typename Block>
419struct Apply_mat_op<mat_trans, T, Block>
420{
421  typedef typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type result_type;
422
423  static result_type
424  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
425    {
426      return m.transpose();
427    }
428};
429
430/// 'Hermitian' matrix operator for non-complex types (results in transpose)
431template <typename T,
432          typename Block>
433struct Apply_mat_op<mat_herm, T, Block>
434{
435  typedef typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type result_type;
436
437  static result_type
438  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
439    {
440      return impl::trans_or_herm(m);
441    }
442};
443
444/// 'Hermitian' matrix operator for complex types (results in conjugate 
445/// transpose)
446template <typename T,
447          typename Block>
448struct Apply_mat_op<mat_herm, complex<T>, Block>
449{
450  typedef typename const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block>::transpose_type 
451      transpose_type;
452  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<expr::op::Conj, transpose_type> 
453      functor_type;
454  typedef typename functor_type::result_type result_type;
455
456  static result_type
457  exec(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
458    {
459      return impl::trans_or_herm(m);
460    }
461};
462
463/// 'Conjugate' matrix operator for non-complex types (results in identity)
464template <typename T,
465          typename Block>
466struct Apply_mat_op<mat_conj, T, Block>
467{
468  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> result_type;
469
470  static result_type
471  exec(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
472    {
473      return m;
474    }
475};
476
477/// 'Conjugate' matrix operator for complex types
478template <typename T,
479          typename Block>
480struct Apply_mat_op<mat_conj, complex<T>, Block>
481{
482  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<expr::op::Conj, 
483    const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> > functor_type;
484  typedef typename functor_type::result_type result_type;
485
486  static result_type
487  exec(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
488    {
489      return conj(m);
490    }
491};
492
493
494/// Convenience function to use matrix operator classes
495template <mat_op_type OpT,
496          typename    T,
497          typename    Block>
498typename Apply_mat_op<OpT, T, Block>::result_type
499apply_mat_op(const_Matrix<T, Block> m)
500{
501  return Apply_mat_op<OpT, T, Block>::exec(m);
502}
503
504
505/// Generic cumulative vector sum
506template <dimension_type d,
507          typename T0,
508          typename T1,
509          typename Block0,
510          typename Block1>
511void
512cumsum(
513  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
514  Vector<T1, Block1> w) 
515    VSIP_NOTHROW
516{
517  //  Effects: w has values equaling the cumulative sum of values in v. 
518  //
519  //  If View is Vector, d is ignored and, for 
520  //    0 <= i < v.size(), 
521  //      w.get(i) equals the sum over 0 <= j <= i of v.get(j)
522  assert( v.size() == w.size() );
523
524  T1 sum = T0();
525  for ( index_type i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i )
526  {
527    sum += v.get(i);
528    w.put(i, sum);
529  }
530}
531
532/// Generic cumulative matrix sum
533template <dimension_type d,
534          typename T0,
535          typename T1,
536          typename Block0,
537          typename Block1>
538void
539cumsum(
540  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> v,
541  Matrix<T1, Block1> w) 
542    VSIP_NOTHROW
543{
544  if ( d == 0 )
545  {
546    //  If View is Matrix and d == 0, then, for 
547    //    0 <= m < v.size(0) and 0 <= i < v.size(1),
548    //      w.get(m, i) equals the sum over 0 <= j <= i of v.get(m, j).
549
550    for ( index_type m = 0; m < v.size(0); ++m )
551    {
552      T1 sum = T0();
553      for ( index_type i = 0; i < v.size(1); ++i )
554      {
555        sum += v.get(m, i);
556        w.put(m, i, sum);
557      }
558    }
559  }
560  else
561  if ( d == 1 )
562  {
563    //  If View is Matrix and d == 1, then, for 
564    //    0 <= i < v.size(0) and 0 <= n < v.size(1), 
565    //      w.get(i, n) equals the sum over 0 <= j <= i of v.get(j, n).
566
567    for ( index_type n = 0; n < v.size(1); ++n )
568    {
569      T1 sum = T0();
570      for ( index_type i = 0; i < v.size(0); ++i )
571      {
572        sum += v.get(i, n);
573        w.put(i, n, sum);
574      }
575    }
576  }
577}
578
579
580/// Generic modulation of a vector by a complex frequency
581template <typename T0,
582          typename T1,
583          typename T2,
584          typename T3,
585          typename Block0,
586          typename Block1>
587T1
588modulate(
589  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
590  T1 nu,
591  T2 phi,
592  Vector<complex<T3>, Block1> w)
593    VSIP_NOTHROW
594{
595  // Requires: The only specializations which must be supported are those 
596  // having T0, T1, T2, and T3 all scalar f or alternatively T0 the same 
597  // as cscalar f and T1, T2, and T3 all scalar f.
598
599  assert(v.size() == w.size());
600  assert((Type_equal<typename impl::Scalar_of<T0>::type, T3>::value));
601  assert((Type_equal<T1, T3>::value));
602  assert((Type_equal<T2, T3>::value));
603
604  // Effects: For 0 <= i < v.size(), w.get(i) has a value equaling 
605  // the product of v.get(i) and the exponential of the product of 
606  // j (sqrt(-1)) and i * nu + phi
607
608  for ( index_type i = v.size(); i-- > 0; )
609  {
610    complex<T3> phase( 0, i * nu + phi );
611    w.put(i, v.get(i) * exp(phase));
612  }
613
614  // Returns: v.size() * nu + phi (the phase needed for processing
615  // a series frame by frame)
616
617  return v.size() * nu + phi;
618}
619
620} // namespace impl
621
622

625  Functions

628
629/// dot products  [math.matvec.dot]
630
631/// dot
632template <typename T0, typename T1, typename Block0, typename Block1>
633typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type
634dot(
635  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
636  const_Vector<T1, Block1> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
637{
638#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
639  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type result_type;
640  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
641    (impl::matvec::Description<result_type>::tag("dot", impl::extent(v)),
642     impl::matvec::Op_count_dot<result_type>::value(impl::extent(v)) );
643#endif
644  return impl::impl_dot(v, w);
645}
646
647
648/// cvjdot
649template <typename T0, typename T1, typename Block0, typename Block1>
650typename Promotion<complex<T0>, complex<T1> >::type
651cvjdot(
652  const_Vector<complex<T0>, Block0> v,
653  const_Vector<complex<T1>, Block1> w) VSIP_NOTHROW
654{
655#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
656  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type result_type;
657  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
658    (impl::matvec::Description<result_type>::tag("cvjdot", impl::extent(v)),
659     impl::matvec::Op_count_cvjdot<result_type>::value(impl::extent(v)));
660#endif
661  return impl::impl_dot(v, conj(w));
662}
663
664 
665/// Transpositions  [math.matvec.transpose]
666
667/// transpose
668template <typename T, typename Block>
669typename const_Matrix<T, Block>::transpose_type
670trans(const_Matrix<T, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
671{
672#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
673  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
674    (impl::matvec::Description<T>::tag("trans", impl::extent(m)));
675#endif
676  return m.transpose();
677}
678
679/// conjugate transpose
680template <typename T, typename Block>
681typename impl::Unary_func_view<impl::expr::op::Conj,
682  typename const_Matrix<complex<T>,
683  Block>::transpose_type>::result_type
684herm(const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block> m) VSIP_NOTHROW
685{
686  typedef typename const_Matrix<complex<T>, Block>::transpose_type 
687    transpose_type;
688  typedef impl::Unary_func_view<impl::expr::op::Conj, transpose_type> 
689    functor_type;
690
691#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
692  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
693    (impl::matvec::Description<complex<T> >::tag("herm", impl::extent(m)),
694     impl::matvec::Op_count_herm<complex<T> >::value(impl::extent(m)));
695#endif
696  return functor_type::apply(m.transpose());
697} 
698
699
700/// Kronecker tensor product  [math.matvec.kron]
701
702/// kronecker product
703template <typename T0,
704          typename T1,
705          typename T2,
706          template <typename, typename> class const_View,
707          typename Block1,
708          typename Block2>
709const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
710kron( T0 alpha, const_View<T1, Block1> v, const_View<T2, Block2> w )
711    VSIP_NOTHROW
712{
713#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
714  typedef typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type
715    >::type result_type;
716  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
717    (impl::matvec::Description<result_type>::tag("kron", impl::extent(v), 
718                                                 impl::extent(w)),
719     impl::matvec::Op_count_kron<impl::Dim_of_view<const_View>::dim, 
720     result_type>::value(impl::extent(v), impl::extent(w)));
721#endif
722  return impl::impl_kron( alpha, v, w );
723}
724
725
726/// Outer product [math.matvec.outer]
727
728/// outer product of two scalar vectors
729template <typename T0,
730          typename T1,
731          typename T2,
732          typename Block1,
733          typename Block2>
734const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type>::type>
735outer( T0 alpha, const_Vector<T1, Block1> v, const_Vector<T2, Block2> w )
736    VSIP_NOTHROW
737{
738  typedef typename Promotion<T1, T2>::type return_type;
739#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
740  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
741    (impl::matvec::Description<return_type>::tag("outer", impl::extent(v), 
742                                                 impl::extent(w)),
743     impl::matvec::Op_count_outer<return_type>::value(impl::extent(v), 
744                                                      impl::extent(w)));
745#endif
746
747  Matrix<return_type> r(v.size(), w.size(), return_type());
748
749  impl::outer(alpha, v, w, r);
750
751  return r;
752}
753
754
755/// Generalized Matrix operations [math.matvec.gem]
756
757/// generalized matrix product
758template <mat_op_type OpA,
759          mat_op_type OpB,
760          typename T0,
761          typename T1,
762          typename T2,
763          typename T3,
764          typename T4,
765          typename Block1,
766          typename Block2,
767          typename Block4>
768void
769  gemp(
770    T0 alpha,
771    const_Matrix<T1, Block1> A,
772    const_Matrix<T2, Block2> B,
773    T3 beta,
774    Matrix<T4, Block4> C)
775     VSIP_NOTHROW
776{
777#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
778  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
779    (impl::matvec::Description<T4>::tag("gemp", impl::extent(A), 
780                                        impl::extent(B)),
781     impl::matvec::Op_count_gemp<T4>::value(impl::extent(A), 
782                                            impl::extent(B), OpA, OpB));
783#endif
784
785  // equivalent to C = alpha * OpA(A) * OpB(B) + beta * C
786
787  impl::gemp( alpha, 
788              impl::apply_mat_op<OpA>(A), 
789              impl::apply_mat_op<OpB>(B),
790              beta, 
791              C );
792} 
793
794
795/// Generalized matrix sum
796template <mat_op_type OpA,
797          typename T0,
798          typename T1,
799          typename T3,
800          typename T4,
801          typename Block1,
802          typename Block4>
803void
804gems(
805  T0 alpha,
806  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> A,
807  T3 beta,
808  Matrix<T4, Block4> C) 
809    VSIP_NOTHROW
810{
811#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
812  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
813    (impl::matvec::Description<T4>::tag("gems", impl::extent(A)),
814     impl::matvec::Op_count_gems<T4>::value(impl::extent(A), OpA));
815#endif
816  impl::gems(alpha, impl::apply_mat_op<OpA>(A), beta, C);
817}
818
819
820/// Miscellaneous functions [math.matvec.misc]
821
822/// cumulative sum
823template <dimension_type d,
824          typename T0,
825          typename T1,
826          template <typename, typename> class const_View,
827          template <typename, typename> class View,
828          typename Block0,
829          typename Block1>
830void
831cumsum(
832  const_View<T0, Block0> v,
833  View<T1, Block1> w) 
834    VSIP_NOTHROW
835{
836#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
837  dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<const_View>::dim;
838  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
839    (impl::matvec::Description<T0>::tag("cumsum", impl::extent(v)),
840     impl::matvec::Op_count_cumsum<dim, T0>::value(impl::extent(v)));
841#endif
842
843  impl::cumsum<d>(v, w);
844}
845
846/// modulate
847template <typename T0,
848          typename T1,
849          typename T2,
850          typename T3,
851          typename Block0,
852          typename Block1>
853T1
854modulate(
855  const_Vector<T0, Block0> v,
856  T1 nu,
857  T2 phi,
858  Vector<complex<T3>, Block1> w)
859    VSIP_NOTHROW
860{
861#if VSIP_PROFILE_MASK & VSIP_IMPL_PROFILE_MASK_MATVEC
862  impl::profile::Scope<impl::profile::matvec> scope
863    (impl::matvec::Description<T0>::tag("modulate", impl::extent(v)),
864     impl::matvec::Op_count_modulate<T0>::value(impl::extent(v)));
865#endif
866  return impl::modulate(v, nu, phi, w);
867}
